systems.description: Ubuntu 22.04 Deskop  that runs the UERANSIM UE application and generates UE traffic. systems.description: 5G SA User Plane Function (UPF) based on Open5GS open source project deployed on Ubuntu 22.04. Machine has two interfaces: one in the BAF DMZ network used for N3 (udp port 2152)/N4 (udp port 8805), and another interface for the N6/SGi communication that uses OSPF routing protocol.

5G SA User Plane Function (UPF) based on Open5GS open source project deployed on Ubuntu 22.04. Machine has three interfaces: one in the 5G core, one in the 5G DMZ  network used for N3 (udp port 2152)/N4 (udp port 8805), and another interface for the N6/SGi communication that uses OSPF routing protocol.

WEB service for subscriber management. based on open5gs-webui and deployed on Ubuntu 22.04. The machine has two interfaces, one in the 5G core network to communicate with the 5g-db machine and on in the 5G DMZ to provide web based subscriber management for the BAF 5G system.

systems.description: ADS (Air Defense System) Surveillance System - C4i (Command, Control, Communications, Computers and Intelligence) [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Command_and_control]. The c4i-ads machine is responsible for "receiving" the radar detected aircrafts (from the "radar" gt machine), "identify" and "classify" each one of these detected aircrafts (unknown-yellow, friend-blue or hostile-red), and "send" the hostiles classified arcrafts to the ADS Weapon System, where the hostiles aircrafts will be shoot down. SSH service is necessary for scoringbot to perform other service checks.
